cab.content: (THIS DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY OF HIS BRITANNIC MAJESTY'S GOVERNMENT)SB OBET, 0 .P.550(24)CABINETNAVAL BABE AT SINGAPORE,TELEGRAMS from The Governor of Hong Kong to the Secretary of State for the Colonies, dated 16th December 1924.(Circulated by the Secretary of State for the Colonies!I.With the approval of the Unofficial Members of both Councils I offer His Majesty'a Government the sum of 50,000 representing in round figures the profits of the control of shipping during the war as a contribution in aid of the Singapore base,II.Referring to my telegram of to-day it is of course understood that the money does not pass through our books in such a manner as to be liable to military contribution.S Whitehall Gardens, S.W.(l) Deoemte r 19th. 1924.
